sorular.soru: Which drivers are you allowed to overtake after this sign?

feedback.metin: This sign indicates a prohibition for lorry drivers to overtake other motor vehicles. This means that this sign does not apply to you. You may overtake all vehicles, as long as it is safe to do so. Even lorries.

sorular.soru: In what situations are you allowed to stop here?
cevaplar: To wait for a passenger to arrive.

feedback.metin: Sign E-1 indicates a parking prohibition on that side of the carriageway. You are only allowed to stop here to drop off or pick up a passenger, or to load or unload goods of a considerable weight or size. You are not allowed to stop to ask for directions, to reset your navigation or to wait for a passenger to arrive, for this is all considered parking.
